Plot: It's night; a wide-eyed fearful child is in bed. When her granny enters the room, the child pretends to be asleep. Granny O'Grimm isn't fooled; she pokes the child with a walker and picks ...
Title: Granny O'Grimm's Sleeping Beauty
Writer: Kathleen O'Rourke, Kathleen O'Rourke (character: Granny O'Grimm), John Walsh (character: Granny O'Grimm)
